title: CFA Program Fund
description: To support students who are preparing for the CFA Exam.  Support includes stipends and scholarships to cover the cost of the exam, and/or administrative costs in preparing the students for this exam (books, materials, mock exams, instructor fees, etc).
marketingContent: To support students who are preparing for the CFA Exam.  Support includes stipends and scholarships to cover the cost of the exam, and/or administrative costs in preparing the students for this exam (books, materials, mock exams, instructor fees, etc).
